summary: Neon Genesis - A social platform for sharing and exploring environmental, disaster-related, and sustainable infrastructure/business ideas. Users can create virtual prototypes, post ideas, like and comment on posts, and use a three-tier investment rating system (diamond: $100-300, blue sapphire: $300-500, red ruby: $500-700). The platform should be attractive and user-friendly like Instagram.
architectural_notes: Social platform focused on sustainable and environmental solutions
Three-tier investment interest indicator system using gemstone metaphors
Virtual prototype creation and sharing capability required
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner with vibrant neon lights and abstract sustainable/environmental theme featuring greens, electric blues, and neon accents (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Diamond gem icon with transparent background, sparkling white/silver diamond suitable for investment rating button (diamond-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Blue sapphire gem icon with transparent background, deep blue sapphire suitable for investment rating button (blue-sapphire-icon.dim_64x64.png)
- Red ruby gem icon with transparent background, vibrant red ruby suitable for investment rating button (red-ruby-icon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Implement user authentication using Internet Identity to allow users to sign up and log in
Build a post creation interface where authenticated users can create and submit new ideas with title, description, category selection, and virtual prototype content
Implement a feed view displaying all posted ideas in an Instagram-like card layout with infinite scroll or pagination
Add filtering capability to the feed allowing users to filter ideas by category (environmental, disaster-related, sustainable infrastructure/business)
Implement a like system where authenticated users can like posts, with like counts displayed on each post and users able to unlike posts they previously liked
Build a commenting system where authenticated users can add text comments to posts and view all comments on a post

Create a three-tier investment rating system where users can rate posts with diamond (100-300 dollars), blue sapphire (300-500 dollars), or red ruby (500-700 dollars) badges indicating their willingness to invest, with aggregate rating counts displayed on each post

Design and implement an attractive Instagram-inspired visual theme with vibrant neon accents, modern typography, card-based layouts, smooth animations, and a cohesive color scheme that emphasizes sustainability and innovation
Render generated hero banner image and gem/stone rating icons as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Create and post ideas with virtual prototype creation tools
Browse and explore ideas feed with filtering by category (environmental, disaster, sustainable infrastructure)
Like and comment system for posts
Three-tier investment rating system (diamond $100-300, blue sapphire $300-500, red ruby $500-700)
Instagram-like attractive and usable UI/UX design

Create a backend data model for ideas/posts that includes title, description, category (environmental, disaster-related, or sustainable infrastructure/business), author identity, creation timestamp, and virtual prototype information
